attributes.action: Scrap the planned increase in fuel duty of 2.35p litre in the forthcoming budget.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fuel prices are already high, with many people unable to use a public transport system due to poor services, or poor timing of those services. These people are being unfairly treated. We have the highest fuel prices and fuel taxation in the world.
